constants

Contains definitions of physical and chemical constants, as well as other needed global variables.

uptrop.constants.AVOGADRO = 6.022140857e+23

Avogadro’s number [mol-1]

uptrop.constants.G = 9.80665

Acceleration due to gravity [m s-2]

uptrop.constants.K_BOLTZMANN = 1.381e-23

Boltzmann’s constant [J K-1]

uptrop.constants.R_GAS_UNIV = 8.314

Universal gas contant [J mol-1 K-1]
